# includesCategory(category)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the filter includes the provided point-of-interest category.

## Declaration

```swift
includesCategory(category: PointOfInterestCategory): boolean | undefined;
```

## Querying filter behavior

- **excludesCategory(category)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the filter excludes the provided point-of-interest category.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the filter excludes the provided point-of-interest category.
items.name: excludesCategory(category)
